headline: Stanley Black & Decker Says COO to Take Over as CEO in October
summary: Stanley Black & Decker announced a CEO transition plan on Monday, with COO Christopher Nelson set to take over the top job on Oct. 1.

headline: Stanley Black & Decker Names Nelson to Succeed Allan as CEO
summary: Stanley Black Decker has designated Christopher Nelson to succeed Donald Allan Jr. as president and chief executive of the tool maker, effective Oct. 1.

raw.headline: Stanley Black & Decker Names Nelson to Succeed Allan as CEO
raw.summary: Stanley Black Decker has designated Christopher Nelson to succeed Donald Allan Jr. as president and chief executive of the tool maker, effective Oct. 1.

headline: Stanley Black & Decker taps COO Christopher Nelson as next CEO
summary: Nelson, who also heads the company's $13 billion tools and outdoor division, will succeed Donald Allan Jr., who served as CEO since July 2022.  Allan Jr. will become executive chair after the transition before retiring in October 2026, the company said.  Nelson joined the tool maker in June 2023 as its COO prior to which he was president of Carrier Global's heating, ventilation, and air conditioning segment.

headline: Stanley Black & Decker Announces Leadership Transition Plan
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE: SWK), a worldwide leader in tools and outdoor, today announced that its Board of Directors has named Christopher Nelson as the Company's next President and Chief Executive Officer, effective October 1, 2025. Mr. Nelson currently serves as Stanley Black & Decker's Chief Operating Officer and Executive Vice President and President of the Tools & Outdoor business.
